label: Kintsu
name: kintsu
description: Kintsu Public API: Points leaderboard/user points, and sMON APY history.

options.label: Get Points Leaderboard
options.name: getPoints
options.description: GET /api/public/points (optionally filter by addresses; supports limit/page).

options.label: Get Latest sMON APY
options.name: getLatestApy
options.description: Fetch APY and return the newest entry plus meta.latestApy.

inputParameters.label: Addresses
inputParameters.name: addresses
inputParameters.description: Comma-separated wallet addresses. If omitted, returns all addresses. Example: 0x...,0x... (no spaces).

inputParameters.label: Limit
inputParameters.name: limit
inputParameters.description: Max results per page. min 1, max 1000. Default 100.

inputParameters.label: Page
inputParameters.name: page
inputParameters.description: Page number for pagination. min 1. Default 1.

inputParameters.label: Days
inputParameters.name: days
inputParameters.description: Number of days of APY history. min 1, max 365. Default 30.
